tika-s0403t36:2_1: Catutthassa pañcame attano guyhaṁ tassa āvikarotīti attano guyhaṁ nigguhituṁ yuttakathaṁ aññassa akathetvā tasseva ācikkhati.
tika-s0403t36:2_2: Tassa guyhaṁ aññesaṁ nācikkhatīti tena kathitaguyhaṁ yathā aññe na jānanti,
tika-s0403t36:5_1: Chaṭṭhe piyo ca hoti manāpo cāti kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṁ dassitaṁ.
tika-s0403t36:5_2: Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno ca hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
tika-s0403t36:5_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa sambodhiṁ kammañca kammaphalañca,
tika-s0403t36:5_4: tena sambodhiyā hetubhūtaṁ sattesu hitasukhaṁ na pariccajati.
tika-s0403t36:5_5: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṁ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo.
tika-s0403t36:5_6: Sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṁyuttānaṁ gambhīrānaṁ kathānaṁ kattā hoti.
tika-s0403t36:5_7: Cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t36:5_12: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṁ hitāhitaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānitvā
tika-s0403t36:5_13: samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahite nisedhetvā hite niyojeti.
